name: Ferns Enterprises
description: trader of a quality assured range of Cen
overview:
Year of Establishment 2009 In the world of service industry customer service is being the most difficult task, Where the increase in the competitive market in products and its services to meet the need and requirement of the Customers.

Products & Services: Ductable AC Unit Package AC Unit Ceiling-Mounted Concealed Split AC Air Chiller Unit Non Central Air Conditioning System Maintenance & Installation Service

Our Professionals: We have been able to attain immense success and continuous growth in offering premium quality products & services due to our skilled professionals. Our stringent selection policy enables us to employ professionals having in-depth domain knowledge and ability to work under immense pressure.

Vision: Exploring the service industry in the field of Airconditioning “Creating a mark in Hearts of Customers” for technical services provided with great satisfaction is our Motto.

Client Satisfaction: Since our inception, we have been committed to offer excellent Central & Non Central Air Conditioning System and reliable installation & maintenance services for these products too. Thus, our professionals work in close coordination of our clients to gauge their demands and accordingly offer them products & services.

Rich Vendor Base: In order to meet the growing demands of our clients, we have associated ourselves with some of the leading manufacturers based across the country. We first ensure that our vendors have in-depth domain knowledge and meet the customized demands of our clients.
